item.title: Hamlet (thumbs down)
item.description: I felt like reading a Great Book, and wanted to refresh myself ahead of reading and watching Tom Stoppard’s Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are Dead. Hence, The Tragical History of Hamlet Prince of Denmark. The play is about a young man navigating - perhaps better put, failing to navigate - life now that his world has been turned upside down and the band-aid of youth and innocence has been ripped off, following his fatherâ€™s untimely death.
